SEARCH
Package net.delugan.teachly.trigger

Class TriggerViewController

java.lang.Object
net.delugan.teachly.trigger.TriggerViewController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/dashboard/triggers") public class TriggerViewController extends Object
Controller for trigger-related views. Handles requests for viewing, creating, editing, and displaying triggers.

    • create

      @GetMapping("create") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView create(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @RequestParam(value="id",required=false) UUID clone_id)
      Handles requests to create a new trigger. Optionally clones an existing trigger if an ID is provided.
      Parameters:
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user
      clone_id - Optional ID of a trigger to clone
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for the trigger creation page

    • edit

      @GetMapping("edit/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView edit(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User, @PathVariable UUID id)
      Handles requests to edit an existing trigger.
      Parameters:
